thread.title: This Ex – Bigg Boss Contestant Claims She Faced Discrimination Because Of Her Hometown
thread.title_full: This Ex – Bigg Boss Contestant Claims She Faced Discrimination Because Of Her Hometown

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: This Ex – Bigg Boss Contestant Claims She Faced Discrimination Because Of Her Hometown
text:
Sukriti Gumber Feb . 27 . 2017 Lopamudra Raut 
Lopamudra Raut won hearts with her stint in Bigg Boss 10. S he was fair team player and a rational housemate – and her popularity was evident as she made it to the top 3 contestants of the season. 
However, Lopa reportedly faced a fair amount of hardships during the journey and she recently spoke about them to a leading daily. She said: 
A lot of people tried to put me down in the house, but I fought back with conviction. Some contestants underestimated me because they couldn’t believe that a small-town girl can reach heights. I faced discrimination in the house because I am from Nagpur and they tried to gang up against me. But the love and support of Salman Khan was very encouraging. And I will cherish it forever. 
That’s shocking! But as they say, good things come to those who hustle – and your success is proof enough, Lopa! 0
